shnitsel.data.shnitsel_db.node_base
===================================

.. py:module:: shnitsel.data.shnitsel_db.node_base


Classes
-------

.. autoapisummary::

   shnitsel.data.shnitsel_db.node_base.ShnitselNode


Module Contents
---------------

.. py:class:: ShnitselNode(dataset, name, level)

   Bases: :py:obj:`xarray.DataTree`


   A tree-like hierarchical collection of xarray objects.

   Attempts to present an API like that of xarray.Dataset, but methods are wrapped to also update all the tree's child nodes.
